RelatedSentence: ( OTCQB:VPIG ) , provider of Oink , the award - winning payment technology for families and teens , today announced that it has partnered with premier e - commerce digital agency , Lyons Consulting Group .

A0: Lyons Consulting Group , a digital e-commerce agency representing PacSun , Maui Jim , Hello Kitty , Warner Brothers and more
RelatedSentence: Lyons Consulting Group is the industry 's premier e - commerce digital agency , serving brand , retail , and B2B organizations such as PacSun , Maui Jim , Hello Kitty , Warner Brothers and many others .

Lyons Consulting Group has also leveraged its award - winning , 5 - years of Magento experience to bundle professional services together into an e - commerce accelerator package for their clients using eBay 's Magento platform .

Oink is the only payment technology designed to allow retailers and game publishers to reach under 21 consumers in a safe , legal and effective manner compliant with the FTC and other international regulations .
